title: kaNDu denDaniTTAl
sahitya:
kaNDu deNDaniTTAl kavalai viTTaghalumE deNDAyudat-tilakanai ten pazhani tannilE


anupallavi

  viNNavar sirai mINDu kaNNiya vAzhvu pera vIram mikka sUranai venriTTa vElanaik-


caraNam    maNNulaga vAzhvinil mAya valaiyil sikki tiNDADit-tighaikka uNDAgum tollai tIra
paNDArat-tirukkOlam pUNDaruL purivOnai ANDi abhayam enrAl ANDu AtkoLvOnaik-
